# osmrdf2023py
**Python installable library for the [RFC Semantic Conventions for OpenStreetMapâ„¢ 2023](https://github.com/EticaAI/openstreetmap-semantic-conventions-2023) ([live specification here](https://eticaai.github.io/openstreetmap-semantic-conventions-2023/))**

## Installing

```bash
pip install osmrdf2023 --upgrade
```
